mapper.select:
SELECT BOOK_TITLE, BOOK_WRITER, BOOK_COMP, BOOK_LOC, ISBN FROM BOOK
and book_Title like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
and book_Writer like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
and book_Comp like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
SELECT B.ISBN, B.BOOK_TITLE, B.BOOK_CONT, B.BOOK_WRITER B.BOOK_COMP, B.BOOK_GENRE, B.BOOK_AMOUNT, B.BOOK_LOC, R.DUE_DATE FROM BOOK B JOIN RENTAL R ON B.ISBN = R.ISBN WHERE ISBN = #{isbn}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOK (ISBN, BOOK_TITLE, BOOK_CONT, BOOK_WRITER, BOOK_COMP, BOOK_GENRE, BOOK_AMOUNT, BOOK_LOC) VALUES(#{isbn}, #{bookTitle}, #{bookCont}, #{bookWriter}, #{bookComp}, #{bookGenre}, #{bookAmount}, #{bookLoc})
